attributes.action: Death Penalty For All Pedophiles And Rapists
attributes.additional_details: We can not keep allowing Pedophiles and Rapists do a small amount of time in prison for us to think they have changed within that time no matter what their actions are vile and traumatising they do not deserve to see the outside world again.
attributes.background: We need to think about what the actions of the pedophiles and rapists are actually doing to their victims! It is so traumatising for them and ruins many lives.
